<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 176 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Barbarian](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=229)

[Basic Fury](/Feats.aspx?ID=6192)

</column>

---

You gain one [barbarian feat](/Feats.aspx?Traits=18). For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your barbarian level is equal to half your character level.

**Special** You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another barbarian feat.
